content: the nørrebro hat slouchy + beanie by denise twum sometimes you just want a quick instant gratification project that you can finish in one evening this hat is just that kind of project combining simple ribbing with a sand stitch for the perfect squishy instant gratification hat if you re pretty fast you can finish it in 2 hours or less named after nørrebro the suburb of copenhagen where i saw and semi-stalked for pictures a lady rocking a similar- looking hat this hat is also everyone s hat because a friend of mine swears that this hat looks great on everyone including her it really is a pretty awesome unisex hat 2020 update i ve knit up a beanie version of this hat a few times and wanted to share that option as well initially i was going to share as a standalone pattern but i think it works best to have it here with the original slouchy version size one size fits most pictured sample knit in marble colorway yarn loops & threads cozy wool 50% acrylic 50% wool 90yd 82m /127g needles 6oz us # 9 circular needle at least 24 for slouchy version - approx 1 ball inches for slouchy w/ pompom - approx 1 2 us #11 circular needle balls us #13 circular needle pictured samples knit in thunder blue notions sandstone and grey sky colorways one stitch marker stitch maker for beanie pompom maker optional lion brand wool-ease thick & quick 80% acrylic 20% wool 87yd 80m /150g 5oz about 0 62 balls approx 3 1oz ©niseyknits 2020 pattern for personal and charity use only pattern not to be reproduced for resale items made from pattern can be sold for profit with prior written permission from designer for questions or comments please send an email to niseyknits@gmail com notes 1x1 ribbing k1 p1 2x2 ribbing k2 p2 instructions for slouchy hat ● cast on 40sts using the smaller needle us #9 if you are a loose knitter or us #11 if you are a tight knitter ● place marker and join ● work 1x1 ribbing or 2x2 ribbing for 3-4 inches switch to larger needles us #11 or us #13 and start the main body pattern optional - you can start the pattern by only knitting 1-2 rnds of the ribbing then go straight into main body pattern main body round 1 knit all around round 2 k1 p1 repeat these two row until the hat is between 9 and 9 5inches long ending on round 2 then start decreases decreases shape crown 1st decrease round rs k2 k2tog * k3 k2tog repeat from * to last stitch k1 - 32 sts next round ws knit to end 2nd decrease round k1 k2tog * k2 k2tog repeat from * to last stitch k1 - 24 sts next round knit to end 3rd decrease round * k1 k2tog repeat from * to end - 16 sts next round knit to end 4th decrease round k2tog
